name: Forged by Fate: The Cursed World Chronicles
name_original: Forged by Fate: The Cursed World Chronicles
description:
Game jam submission for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. 

Controls: 

W, S = forwards, backwards

A, D = turn left, turn right

F = Interact/attack

arrow up, arrow down = Volume control

Go on a epic quest as an adventurer seeking fortune! Battle menacing monsters, complete a puzzle, increase your abilities and defeat the final boss!

Features: Combat, dialogue, stat improvement and a puzzle.

Game art by Giovanni Tromp.

Programming by Marius Janse.

Game design by both :)

Acknowledgments:

Creepy Forest by harayu
